兵工廠4000公里長征 雲加：排強陣

【now.com體育】阿仙奴即將在歐霸賽事作客白俄羅斯的巴迪，單是雙方的距離，原來阿仙奴需面對來回4000公里的旅程，領隊雲加卻表明會排強陣。

周中將會上演24場歐霸賽事，其中H組的阿仙奴將會作客白俄羅斯的巴迪。阿仙奴周一才以2:0擊敗西布朗後，周四就需應付歐霸比賽，更要遠征2000公里前往白俄羅斯，即來回需面對4000公里的行程，加上周日更要在聯賽戰線與白禮頓交手，戰頻兼舟車勞動，對阿仙奴排陣難免有一定困難。

雲加受訪時難免提及未來緊密的賽程和輪換事宜，堅稱排主力落場：「周一出戰後，周四要作客白俄羅斯，周日早上又要比賽，對球隊排陣有一定影響。但我們需接受（賽程安排），我會攜同一隊成員以及少許年青球員出任後備以應戰。」

阿仙奴周一憑今夏加盟的新兵拿卡錫迪個人梅開二度，以2:0擊敗西布朗；至於白俄羅斯冠軍巴迪，對上7次在主場出戰歐洲賽均未錄得敗仗，而他們首場歐霸賽事作客與貝爾格萊德紅星打成1:1平手。

基昂：雲格已不再信任奧斯爾

阿仙奴名宿基昂在接受BBC5電台的採訪中表示，他感覺雲格已經不再信任奧斯爾了。

　　山齊士和奧斯爾的合約都在明年夏天到期，在阿仙奴2-0戰勝西布朗的比賽中，山齊士正選出場，而奧斯爾則是後備出場。賽後，基昂就質疑了奧斯爾的比賽精神。

　　他說：「我現在已經不太信任奧斯爾了，因為他的比賽態度。今晚他沒有正選就是因為教練不再信任他了。我認為這背後一定有故事。」

　　記者問：「我能問下原因嗎？當在史坦福橋時，山齊士傷癒歸隊，也是先打後備啊。奧斯爾傷癒後，今晚先坐後備，這和山齊士有什麼不同嗎？」

　　基昂說：「今夏奧斯爾沒參加德國國家隊的比賽，他在季前賽的第一天就回到了球隊，在他周圍也有很多質疑聲。上季，他有幾個月都迷失了，我認為那是他的策略，他只不過是想離開球會罷了。我也不知道，我只是感覺，雲格在做選擇時，已經覺得他不再值得信賴了。」

PLEGUEZUELO？

https://youtu.be/_482Cl1TI6s
依個

On the team news

I said on Monday night that I would play an experienced team with a young bench - that’s what I’ll do.


We have a very tight schedule. It’s an important game and that’s why only one or two young players will start the game.

We will have a very experienced team out tomorrow.


Are you going meet with Alex Hleb - what will you ask him?

Yes, he is coming tonight to visit us.

What will I ask him? I will ask him if he is happy and what is he doing. I see that he is living here now, so I will ask him what he’s doing.

Yes, I have been in this country before. I came with the French national team, they played against Belarus here.

Technically they always have good sides, France had a very difficult game here.

We watched them (Borisov) yesterday, they are a team of good quality technically, they are strong and well organised. We will need a good performance to have a chance.

Will the atmosphere be tough for the young players to handle?

I believe that is part of it. When you play for Arsenal at a young age.

Per Mertesacker, who is sitting next to me, started at a young age and you have to cope with that.

It’s a good test for the young players, resistance to that type of pressure. They will have their first knowledge of that tomorrow night.

They have a new stadium, a good crowd of 17,000. It will be very loud.

On Ainsley Maitland-Niles

His best position is central defensive midfielder. He has great quality, exceptional pace, capacity to steal the ball without making fouls.

I’m convinced he is ready to play. He has to improve a little bit on the concentration front because that demands of top level football don’t tolerate some lapses of concentration.

But all the res is there. He has a great future.

Historically Borisov have had problems with racism, is that a concern?

I don’t have any preconceived ideas. I hope that won’t happen. UEFA have been strong to deal with that.

Wenger on Gilmour, McGuane and Dragomir

Charlie is a defender, or a central midfielder. McGuane is a defensive midfielder, he can play wing-back or even centre-back. In training sometimes he plays with us at centre-back.

Dragomir is a Romanian boy who has been with us for a few years. He is a No.10, Wilshere style. Left footed, a creative player.

Do you think they are ready for an opportunity?

This is the kind of job were you do not get 10 opportunities to play for Arsenal. When you get one, even if they only play 20 minutes, they have to convince people that you have the quality and the courage to play and show those qualities.

There is always an uncertainty. We know is training, you see the player has the qualities. After, to show it during the competition, is something different. It’s my experience that you only discover that in competition.

Was it the wrong decision for Hleb to leave Arsenal?

At the time Barcelona were the best team in the world be a distance. You can understand that he was tempted to do it.

It was not the right decision for him because he did not have the career after at Barcelona. It had a negative impact on his career.

He was a great, great player. But he played on the same side as Lionel Messi and that is nearly an impossible task for any player in the world.

10「兵」避戰？雲加：正選只用2小將

【now.com體育】阿仙奴在周四歐霸盃將作客巴迪，領隊雲加表明正選陣容只會有1或2名小將，但據知拿卡錫迪、奧斯爾、阿歷斯山齊士等10名一隊球員都沒有隨大軍出發到白俄羅斯。

「我在早前說過，我會派出一支富經驗的球隊，再配合以小將為主的後備，這是我們今場的做法。我們的賽程很頻密，但這是一場重要的比賽，所以只會有1或2名年輕球員踢正選。」雲加（Arsene Wenger）在周三賽前記者會這樣說。

不過，少用年輕球員不代表精銳盡出，據了解，後衛哥斯尼、比利連、蒙利爾、哥拉辛拿斯、中場艾朗藍斯、格列沙加、奧斯爾、翼鋒阿歷斯山齊士、伊禾比、前鋒拿卡錫迪都沒有隨隊出征。

雖然奧斯爾已傷癒，在周一鬥西布朗的英超能以後備身份落場，但今戰將不會披甲；翼鋒伊禾比就因為在該戰觸傷大腿，需要多點時間休息。至於哥斯尼、艾朗藍斯及格列沙加，雖然沒有受傷，但齊齊於周三的操練中缺席。
